sentence.Network_en: Recent excavations testify to the presence of cultivated inhabitants on the hill during the Arthurian period.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几次发掘证实了亚瑟王时期这座山上有农耕人口居住过。

sentence.Network_en: Hank Morgan is heartbroken at the end because he cannot get back to his Arthurian sweetheart.
sentence.Network_cn: 汉克·摩根到了最后悲痛欲绝,因为他无法回到阿瑟王时代爱人的身边.

sentence.Network_en: In arthurian legend, the site of King arthur's court.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国亚瑟王传奇中亚瑟王的王宫所在地.
